akha.yakhont.weaver

Class Weaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • akha.yakhont.weaver.Weaver

  • public class Weaver
extends Object
    The Weaver class weaves the given application's compiled classes (both Java and Kotlin) according to the configuration file info; supports both explicit method callbacks declarations and declarations via annotations (which defines callbacks for the annotated methods).
    For more info please refer to the 'weaver.config' configuration file.

    Weaver supports any applications (i.e. you can use Weaver without Yakhont library).

public void run(boolean debug,

                             String... configFiles)
                      throws NotFoundException,
                             CannotCompileException,
                             IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Starts weaving.
        Parameters:
        debug - The flag which switches ON / OFF printing debug messages to the console
        packageName - The application's package name
        classesDir - The location of the given application's compiled classes
        classPath - The Java compiler's class path, used to compile the given application
        bootClassPath - The android.bootClasspath (actually android.jar's location)
        addConfig - Indicates whether the configuration file(s) provided should be added to the default one
        configFiles - The names (and locations) of configuration files (if any), or null (means the default one)
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - please refer to the exception description
        CannotCompileException - please refer to the exception description
        IOException - please refer to the exception description

      • run

                String bootClassPath,
                boolean addConfig,
                String... configFiles)
         throws NotFoundException,
                CannotCompileException,
                IOException
        Starts weaving.
        Parameters:
        debugBuild - The flag which indicates whether the given build is debug one or not
        debug - The flag which switches ON / OFF printing debug messages to the console
        packageName - The application's package name
        classesDirs - The location(s) of the given application's compiled classes
        classPath - The Java compiler's class path, used to compile the given application
        bootClassPath - The android.bootClasspath (actually android.jar's location)
        addConfig - Indicates whether the configuration file(s) provided should be added to the default one
        configFiles - The names (and locations) of configuration files (if any), or null (means the default one)
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - please refer to the exception description
        CannotCompileException - please refer to the exception description
        IOException - please refer to the exception description

                           String line)
                    throws CannotCompileException
        Parses the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        mapM - The internal representation of methods configuration info
        mapA - The internal representation of annotations configuration info
        line - The line to parse

      • getNewMethod

        protected String getNewMethod(ClassPool classPool,
                              CtMethod methodSrc,
                              String data,
                              CtClass clsDest)
                       throws NotFoundException,
                              CannotCompileException
        Creates a new overriding method in the destination class.
        Parameters:
        classPool - The ClassPool
        methodSrc - The method to override
        data - The code to weave
        clsDest - The destination class
        Returns:
        The String containing the Java code of the created method
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - please refer to the exception description
        CannotCompileException - please refer to the exception description
